name: Becoming Omega
storyline:
In Becoming Ω your Ultimate Goal is to ascend from a mere human into an Eldritch Dark God and reign over lesser Deities. Starting off as an Enoken (normal Human) dealing with Threats on a day to day basis in a world that seemingly started with lives already in motion and danger around every corner you find yourself wanting to figure out where everything came from and why no one can remember anything before the year 100 A.XE.
Set out on an epic adventure with procedurally generated quests pushing you further and further down the path of finding out the truth about the world. Discover hidden Ancient Temples and learn about the inner machinations of the universe to reach higher levels of being. Form a Pantheon with your Fellow Gods and Destroy the barrier locking away Ultimate power that is the knowledge of the worlds creation.
summary:
Becoming Ω (Omega) is an Open World Multiplayer Action RPG where only the strong can prevail.
In Becoming Ω your Ultimate Goal is to ascend from a mere human into an Eldritch Dark God and reign over lesser Deities.
Fast Paced Fights and Flying Combat, Discover Ancient Mana Temples to learn the unique Divine Elements,
Hunt GODS alone or with your assembled pantheon, Create your own kingdom from the ground up as you start your journey to BECOME OMEGA!
